languages.text: "Здесь наши пути расходятся, {name}. Ваше преступление уже ничто не сможет оправдать".
"This is where our paths diverge, {name}. There is nothing that can justify your crime anymore."
languages.original_text: "Здесь наши пути расходятся, {name}. Ваше преступление уже ничто не сможет оправдать".

traits.locale_text: "This is where our paths diverge, {name}. There is nothing that can justify your crime anymore."
"This is where our paths diverge, {name}. There is nothing that can justify your crime anymore."

"This is where our paths diverge, {name}. There is nothing that can justify your crime anymore."

languages.text: "Hier trennen sich unsere Wege, {name}. Es gibt nichts, was Euer Verbrechen weiterhin rechtfertigen könnte."
languages.original_text: "This is where our paths diverge, {name}. There is nothing that can justify your crime anymore."

traits.locale_text: "Hier trennen sich unsere Wege, {name}. Es gibt nichts, was Euer Verbrechen weiterhin rechtfertigen könnte."

languages.text: « C'est ici que nos Voies se séparent, {name}. Plus rien ne peut justifier votre crime. »
languages.original_text: "This is where our paths diverge, {name}. There is nothing that can justify your crime anymore."

traits.locale_text: « C'est ici que nos Voies se séparent, {name}. Plus rien ne peut justifier votre crime. »

languages.text: “看来我们只能分道扬镳了，{name}，已经没有任何证词能为你的罪行辩护了。”
languages.original_text: "This is where our paths diverge, {name}. There is nothing that can justify your crime anymore."

traits.locale_text: “看来我们只能分道扬镳了，{name}，已经没有任何证词能为你的罪行辩护了。”

languages.text: «Aquí es donde se separan nuestros caminos, {name}. Ya no hay nada que pueda justificar su crimen».
languages.original_text: "This is where our paths diverge, {name}. There is nothing that can justify your crime anymore."

traits.locale_text: «Aquí es donde se separan nuestros caminos, {name}. Ya no hay nada que pueda justificar su crimen».

languages.text: 「{name}、ここで私たちの道は分かれました。もはやあなたの罪を正当化できるものは何もありません」
languages.original_text: "This is where our paths diverge, {name}. There is nothing that can justify your crime anymore."

traits.locale_text: 「{name}、ここで私たちの道は分かれました。もはやあなたの罪を正当化できるものは何もありません」

languages.text: "Yollarımız burada ayrılıyor {name}. Artık kendini aklayacak bir şey yapamazsın."
languages.original_text: "This is where our paths diverge, {name}. There is nothing that can justify your crime anymore."

traits.locale_text: "Yollarımız burada ayrılıyor {name}. Artık kendini aklayacak bir şey yapamazsın."
